headline.value: Curate live, async, and cohort learning in one delightful lab

description.value: Educators, enablement leads, and mentors curate personalised skill journeys with reusable blocks.

items.title: Learning catalog
items.description: Discover live cohorts, on-demand videos, and guided certifications.
list: Search by role, skill, and product area.
Prerequisites and time commitment at a glance.
Automated reminders keep learners on track.

items.title: Cohort journeys
items.description: Facilitated cohorts with milestone-based outcomes and peer accountability.
list: Breakout rooms powered by timezone-friendly scheduling.

items.title: Mentor marketplace
items.description: Match learners with certified mentors for office hours and coaching.
list: Mentor bios with specialties and availability.
Session recordings saved to learner notebooks.

items.title: Project library
items.description: Hands-on briefs with scoring rubrics and solution walkthroughs.
list: Publish showcases to share with hiring managers.

items.title: Resource library
items.description: Articles, podcasts, and community threads curated around each skill.
list: Save favourites and build personal reading lists.
Auto-recommend next steps based on skill gaps.

items.title: Certification badges
items.description: Celebrate mastery with shareable badges, transcripts, and endorsements.
list: Issue verifiable credentials with blockchain proofs.
Sync achievements to Slack and LinkedIn automatically.
